I am really sorry to hear that :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 26, 2008, 01:55:23 pm[/size][hr]I figured it out so sorry to waste your time umm all i had wrong was the command substring I put it back at 3 and it worked fine. ;D

item.title: Help with a menu error please?
item.dc:creator: @mudvayne5493 mudvayne5493
item.description:
@mudvayne5493 wrote:

ok I made a command that brings up a menu and I try to use the command and i get this

[client-1-mudvayne]: playerCommand: news
java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -1
at java.lang.String.substring(String.java:1938)
at java.lang.String.substring(String.java:1905)
at client.customCommand(client.java:10613)
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19776)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:15638)
at client.process(client.java:15608)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
at server.main(server.java:49)
omfg pks v2 [fatal] - exception

I used this code for the menu

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("news") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@Latest updates", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Command ::afk added", 8145); sendQuest("Pickup disabled use ::item(admin+)", 8147); sendQuest("Added news and staff menus", 8148); sendQuest("Hopefully I figure out how to add..", 8149); sendQuest("god wars dungeon and godswords", 8149); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Can someone help me fix this please?

Oh and I made this menu just like that one and it works

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("staff") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@How to get mod or admin/hidden admin", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("1.Register at homepage.", 8145); sendQuest("2.Follow all the rules wich can be found on hompage.", 8147); sendQuest("3.Help people and be nice.", 8148); sendQuest("4.Vote for server dayly.", 8149); sendQuest("5.Don't ask for staff.", 8150); sendQuest("6.Don't abuse the server in any way.", 8151); sendQuest("7.You get better chance if you help me out =P.", 8152); sendQuest("8.Adding me on msn is a chance increase.", 8153); sendQuest("IF YOU FOLLOW THIS YOU WILL PROBABLY GET MOD OR ADMIN.", 8154); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

So 1 works other one doesnt did i do somethin wrong? im confused
I put them both under custom commands.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with a menu error please?
